name: Hide & Seek - Game
description:
From the Best Mobile App Awards winners comes the new hit!

Hide it. Seek it.
It's that simple.
Join millions around the world to the Hide&Seek Saga:

* Hundreds of hiding places.
* Dozens of objects to Hide&Seek.
* Levels to explore.
* Great atmosphere and animations.

Play on your own, challenge a friend or race with a group of friends.
Get coins to upgrade your character!
Be a winner!
